de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.project

Class ProjectUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.project.ProjectUtil

  • public class ProjectUtil
extends Object
    This class contains Utility methods that can be used in Project settings
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam

      • setAnnotationPreference

        public static void setAnnotationPreference(String aUsername,
                           RepositoryService aRepositoryService,
                           AnnotationService aAnnotationService,
                           BratAnnotatorModel aBModel,
                           Mode aMode)
                                    throws org.springframework.beans.BeansException,
                                           FileNotFoundException,
                                           IOException
        Set annotation preferences of users for a given project such as window size, annotation layers,... reading from the file system.
        Parameters:
        aUsername - The User for whom we need to read the preference (preferences are stored per user)
        aBModel - The BratAnnotatorModel that will be populated with preferences from the file
        aMode -
        Throws:
        org.springframework.beans.BeansException
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException
